channel.title: Duping With Trade [Need to Stop Movement while in trade]
channel.description: Hey guys , soo players can dupe on my server if they are able to move while in trade by clicking the mini-map, so if i stop the mini-map movement (or anymovement at all) while in trade its an easy fix. but i dont know the code to stop movement , and where to put the code . greatly appreciated if you help, thanks :) THE BASE IS PI 317

item.description:

item.title: Duping With Trade [Need to Stop Movement while in trade]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Walking.java, if (c.inTrade) { return false; } May need to rename some stuff, but it works. Just wrote here… excuse my conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Duping With Trade [Need to Stop Movement while in trade]
item.dc:creator: @xJavac xJavac
item.description:
@xJavac wrote:

player.isFrozen == true;

^ Lul.

I don’t know how I would add that in PI though, i use 562 rs2hd. Also, I’m not sure if this is even a proper way too stop a dupe, why don’t you just make it close the Trade Screen when they move.
